alert.note: Alert for Amite; Pike (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 7:22PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern St. Helena, northeastern East Feliciana and northwestern Tangipahoa Parishes, southwestern Pike and southeastern Amite Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 722 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kentwood, or 11 miles northeast of Greensburg, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Liberty, Greensburg, Magnolia, Kentwood, Osyka, Felps, Darlington, Gillsburg, Easleyville and Tangipahoa. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 51 and 66. Interstate 55 in Mississippi between mile markers 1 and 10. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
